Class TicTacToeMain

  • java.lang.Object
    • TicTacToeController
      • TicTacToeMain

  • public class TicTacToeMain
extends TicTacToeController
    This class implement basic logic for the TicTacToe game and store basic data structure like gameboard. It will inherit some functions created in TicTacToeController

      • startGame

        public void startGame()
        this startGame() method will determine who first move by asking the user. After confirming the first move, it will then begin the game
